name: zinecube
overview:
Zinecube allows user to take images/video/text from anywhere on the web and create an interactive magazine. The company provides users with an embed link that they can use to post the zine on facebook, myspace, blogs, websites, etc… to display content - which means that once you update the zine on zinecube.com, the zine is updated anywhere that it is embedded to allow for easy multisite updates.

There is a professional services piece in their next BETA 2 release which includes enhanced statistics for a users’ zine, a private page, and advertising options.

The company is only a 2 person shop running bootstrapped at the moment. The company is focusing its efforts on being “the” place for online zines for both amateur and professional user generated content for displaying on e-readers of all types as well as on the web.
